{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Gorou
|date               = 2022-05-18
|zh                 = 
;今天是五郎的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''你们走快点呀，到了山顶就能坐下来一起吃蛋糕了！
:'''五郎：'''派蒙很有干劲呢，要来场登山比赛吗？
:'''派蒙：'''好，比就比，输的人要让对方摸摸尾巴！
:'''旅行者：'''可是派蒙没有尾巴。
:'''派蒙：'''那就…那就摸耳朵！
:'''派蒙：'''哼哼，派蒙是不会输的~那句话怎么说来着…
:'''派蒙：'''「飞，比跑快吧？」
:'''五郎：'''气势不错嘛！那就一起向着顶峰全力前进吧！
|dialogue_review_zh = 「一起向着顶峰全力前进吧！」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Gorou]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Paimon:''' Hurry up, guys! When we get to the top of the mountain, we can sit down and have cake together!
:'''Gorou:''' Paimon sure is excited. Do you want to have a race to the top?
:'''Paimon:''' Sure, bring it on! Loser has to let the other person touch their tail!
:'''Traveler:''' But Paimon doesn't have a tail.
:'''Paimon:''' Then&mdash; ears then!
:'''Paimon:''' Hehe, Paimon isn't going to lose~ What's that saying again?
:'''Paimon:''' "Wouldn't gliding be faster?"<ref group="Note">This line references Venti's [[Venti/Voice-Overs#Sprint Start|sprint voice-over]]. [[Venti/Voice-Overs/Chinese#冲刺开始|In Chinese]], it is literally "Flying is faster than running, right?"</ref>
:'''Gorou:''' That's quite the spirit! Let's forge ahead to the top together then!
|dialogue_review_en = Let's forge ahead to the top together!
}}
